description: Energy Blast allows you to hurl bolts of energy at your foes, and can often send them flying with Knockback.

description.long: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Energy Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

A devastating attack, Power Burst unleashes a massive amount of energy dealing very high damage at short distances.  The impact from this burst often knocks back most foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

description.short: Sniper, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback, Self +Range
description.long: A focused blast that can travel great distances with high Accuracy. This is a sniper attack, and is best fired from a distance, as it can be interrupted. Sniper Blast may knock targets backwards. If you have more than 97% To-Hit, this attack becomes instant-cast. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

description.short: Ranged Minor DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe High Knockback
description.long: This ranged attack deals little damage, but sends the target flying for a great distance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

description.short: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Knockback
description.long: You hurl a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target. Explosive Blast may knock targets backwards. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals extreme Energy and Smashing damage to all nearby foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
